228b2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du na bdag rnam par dag pas rnam par thar pa'i
228b3('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/
228b4('bum): bdag med pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par
228b5('bum): dag pa'i slad du mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
228b6('bum): ci'i slad du na bdag rnam par dag pas mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/
228b7('bum): bdag med pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa'o/ /
229a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du na bdag rnam
229a2('bum): par dag pas ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/ bdag med pa'i phyir ting nge
229a3('bum): 'dzin med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
229a4('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du na bdag rnam par dag pas gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa lags/
229a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/ bdag med pa'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /gsol
229a6('bum): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu
229a7('bum): rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du na bdag rnam par dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan
229b1('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/ bdag med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/
229b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /
229b3('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du na bdag rnam par dag pas mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu
229b4('bum): rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/ bdag med pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pa med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du so so yang
229b5('bum): dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du na bdag
229b6('bum): rnam par dag pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/ bdag med
229b7('bum): pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du byams pa chen po rnam par dag pa'o/ /
230a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du na bdag
230a2('bum): rnam par dag pas byams pa chen po rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/ bdag med pa'i
230a3('bum): phyir byams pa chen po med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du snying rje chen po rnam par dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan
230a4('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du na bdag rnam par dag pas snying rje chen po rnam
230a5('bum): par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/ bdag med pa'i phyir snying rje chen po med pa ni shin tu rnam par
230a6('bum): dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
230a7('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du na bdag rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dras pa bco brgyad
230b1('bum): rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/ bdag med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med pa
230b2('bum): ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
230b3('bum): pa| rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du na bdag rnam par dag pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa lags/
230b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/ bdag med pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /gsol
230b5('bum): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam
230b6('bum): par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du na bdag rnam par dag pas lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
230b7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/ bdag med pa'i phyir lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom
231a1('bum): ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
231a2('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du na bdag rnam par dag pas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan
231a3('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/ bdag med pa'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/
231a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
231a5('bum): phyir ro| |gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du na bdag rnam par dag pas dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
231a6('bum): 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/ bdag med pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par
231a7('bum): dag pa'i slad du rang byang chub rnam par dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
231b1('bum): ci'i slad du na bdag rnam par dag pas rang byang chub rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/ bdag med pa'i
231b2('bum): phyir rang byang chub med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan
231b3('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du na bdag rnam par dag pas lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam
231b4('bum): par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/ bdag med pa'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med pa ni shin tu rnam
231b5('bum): par dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
231b6('bum): 'byor| shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du na bdag rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom
231b7('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/ bdag med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// //
232a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgya gya dgu pa/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gnyis su ma mchis shing / rnam par dag
232a2('bum): pa ni thob par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon par rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/
232a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du gnyis su ma mchis shing / rnam par dag pa thob par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon par rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
232a4('bum): bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du gzugs kun tu mtha'
232a5('bum): yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas
232a6('bum): gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
232a7('bum): nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
232b1('bum): 'byor| shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom
232b2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas
232b3('bum): pa'i slad du 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i
232b4('bum): slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
232b5('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du 'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
232b6('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas 'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa
232b7('bum): rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom
233a1('bum): ldan 'das/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
233a2('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa
233a3('bum): lags| bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
233a4('bum): bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du mig kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/
233a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas mig kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las
233a6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du rna ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /
233a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas rna ba kun
233b1('bum): tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol
233b2('bum): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du sna kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i

233b5('bum): tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha'
233b6('bum): yas pas lce kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
233b7('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du lus kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/

234a3('bum): 'das/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du yid kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /

234a5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du gzugs

234a7('bum): tu mtha' yas pas gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha
234b1('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du sgra kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

234b4('bum): tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du dri kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
234b5('bum): ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas dri kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang
234b6('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du ro kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
234b7('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas ro kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par
235a1('bum): dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /
235a2('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du reg kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag
235a3('bum): pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas reg kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
235a4('bum): stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du chos kun
235a5('bum): tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha'
235a6('bum): yas pas chos kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa
235a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du mig gi rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
235b1('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas mig gi rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha'
235b2('bum): yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom

235b4('bum): pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan
235b5('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i
235b6('bum): slad du sna'i rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
235b7('bum): 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas sna'i rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las
236a1('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du lce'i
236a2('bum): rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad
236a3('bum): du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas lce'i rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong
236a4('bum): pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du lus kyi rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas
236a5('bum): pa'o| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas
236a6('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med
236a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du yid kyi rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
236b1('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas
236b2('bum): pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/

243b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du phyi stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /

244a2('bum): mtha' yas pas phyi stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha
244a3('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du phyi nang stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
244a4('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas phyi nang stong pa nyid kun tu
244a5('bum): mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /

244a7('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa
244b1('bum): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
244b2('bum): kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du chen po stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom

244b7('bum): ro| |gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du 'dus byas stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/

251b2('bum): shes pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du

251b4('bum): dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /
251b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas lam gyi rnam
251b6('bum): pa shes pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
251b7('bum): nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
252a1('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas rnam pa thams
252a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa
252a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgya dgu bcu pa/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang de ltar rtogs pa ni
252a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
252a5('bum): ro| |gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du gang de ltar rtogs pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ bcom ldan
252a6('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
252a7('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshu rol gyi 'gram mam/ pha rol gyi 'gram mam/ gnyis ka'i dbus na mi gnas na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab
252b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
252b2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshu rol gyi 'gram mam/ pha rol gyi 'gram mam/ gnyis ka'i dbus na mi gnas shing shin tu rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan
252b3('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs
252b4('bum): kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la dmigs pa'i tshul du 'du shes su bgyid pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog tu 'byin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
252b5('bum): phyin pa ring du spong ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor/ legs so legs so/ /rab 'byor/ de ni ming du'ang chags pa yin/ mtshan mar
252b6('bum): yang chags pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med do/ ming med pa'o/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na ming du'ang chags shing mtshan mar yang chags pa lags/
252b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ming du 'dzin tam mtshan
253a1('bum): mar 'dzin na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ming dang mtshan mar 'dzin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pas shes rab kyi pha
253a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa gsog tu 'byin to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du spong ngo / /rab 'byor/ gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa
253a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan mar 'dzin cing / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan mar bzung nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su byed na/ de
253a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su byed cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog tu 'byin to/ /shes rab kyi pha
253a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa ring du spong ngo / /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang
253a6('bum): de ltar legs par bshad cing legs par bstan la/ chags pa dang ma chags pa de dag kyang mchis pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa
253a7('bum): rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chags pa ni gang yin/ ma chags pa ni gang yin/ rab
253b1('bum): 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pa/ gzugs stong pa zhes bya bar
253b2('bum): 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /'du shes stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /'du byed stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags

256a7('bum): ba'i 'bras bu stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /rang byang chub stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags

256b2('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes

256b7('bum): la spyod na chags pa'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid la

257b6('bum): pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ /rang byang chub la spyod na chags pa'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
257b7('bum): spyod na chags pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang yang 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams kyi chags pa med
258a1('bum): pa gang zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
258a2('bum): pa la spyod pa ni gzugs la gzugs zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /tshor ba la tshor ba zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /'du shes la 'du shes zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med
258a3('bum): do| |'du byed la 'du byed ces bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i
258a4('bum): chos zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la da ltar byung ba'i chos
258a5('bum): zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di snyam
258a6('bum): du bdag gis sbyin pa zhig sbyin no/ /'di la sbyin pa zhig byin no/ /sbyin pa 'di lta bu zhig sbyin no zhe'am/ bdag gis ni tshul khrims shig bsrung ngo / /tshul khrims 'di lta bu zhig
258a7('bum): bsrung ngo zhe'am/ bdag gis ni bzod pa zhig bsgom mo/ /bzod pa 'di lta bu zhig bsgom mo zhe'am/ bdag gis ni brtson 'grus shig brtsom mo/ /brtson 'grus 'di lta bu
258b1('bum): zhig brtsam mo zhe'am/ bdag gis ni bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag go/ bsam gtan 'di lta bu zhig la mnyam par bzhag go zhe'am/ bdag gis ni shes rab gcig bsgom
258b2('bum): mo| |shes rab 'di lta bu zhig bsgom mo zhe'am/ bdag gis ni bsod nams shig bskyed do/ /bsod nams 'di lta bu zhig bskyed do/ /bsod nams 'di tsam zhig bskyed do/ /bdag
258b3('bum): gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud par bya'o/ /bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o/ /bdag gis ni sems can yongs su smin par bya'o zhe'am/
258b4('bum): bdag gis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o snyam du sems pa med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa
258b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni rnam par rtog pa de lta bu thams cad/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po
258b6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
258b7('bum): nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos
259a1('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir med cing mi rgyu ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de
259a2('bum): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chags pa med pa dag go / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/
259a3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ rnam grangs gang gis na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams
259a4('bum): kyi chags par 'gyur ba yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka/ 'di la byang chub sems
259a5('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mos sems su 'du shes pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du
259a6('bum): shes pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'du shes pa dang /
259a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang / nang stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / stong pa nyid
259b1('bum): stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / 'dus ma byas
259b2('bum): stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du 'du
259b3('bum): shes pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / mi dmigs pa
259b4('bum): stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes
259b5('bum): pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams su 'du shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / dbang po rnams
259b6('bum): su 'du shes pa dang / stobs rnams su 'du shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su 'du shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par 'du shes pa dang /
259b7('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / bsam gtan rnams su 'du shes pa dang / tshad med pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
260a1('bum): rnams su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang /
260a2('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par 'du shes pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams su 'du shes
260a3('bum): pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams su 'du shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su 'du shes pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / so so yang dag par
260a4('bum): rig pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / byams pa chen por 'du shes pa dang / snying rje chen por 'du shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du 'du shes pa dang /
260a5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su 'du shes par gyur te/ sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag tu 'du shes nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mngon par bsdus te
260a6('bum): gcig tu btul nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing / yongs su bsngo ba der yang 'du shes pa de dag ni/ kau shi ka/ byang chub sems dpa'i
260a7('bum): theg pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi chags pa ste/ chags pa de dag la chags par gyur na/ chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par
260b1('bum): mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ kau shi ka/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /'du shes kyi rang bzhin
260b2('bum): yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /'du byed kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /mig gi rang bzhin yongs
260b3('bum): su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /rna ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /sna'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /lce'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /lus
260b4('bum): kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /yid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /sgra'i rang bzhin yongs
260b5('bum): su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /dri'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /re'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /reg gi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /chos kyi
260b6('bum): rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /
260b7('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs
261a1('bum): su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo
261a2('bum): bar mi nus so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
261a3('bum): rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus
261a4('bum): so| |mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi
261a5('bum): nus so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi
261a6('bum): nus so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi
261a7('bum): nus so/ /sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /me'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar
261b1('bum): mi nus so/ /rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin
261b2('bum): yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /ma rig pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /'du byed kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs
261b3('bum): su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /skye mched drug gi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su
261b4('bum): bsngo bar mi nus so/ /tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /sred pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /len pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /srid
261b5('bum): pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /skye ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /rga shi'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
261b6('bum): rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo
261b7('bum): bar mi nus so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /shes rab
262a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang
262a2('bum): bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /chen po
262a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs
262a4('bum): su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus
262a5('bum): so| |thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /rang bzhin
262a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang
262a7('bum): bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi
262b1('bum): nus so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /dran pa nye bar
262b2('bum): bzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs
262b3('bum): su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang
262b4('bum): bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo
262b5('bum): bar mi nus so/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /tshad med pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
262b6('bum): pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rang
262b7('bum): bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /mngon par shes
263a1('bum): pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi
263a2('bum): rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo
263a3('bum): bar mi nus so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /snying rje chen
263a4('bum): po'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang
263a5('bum): bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi
263a6('bum): nus so/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
263a7('bum): yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
263b1('bum): pos gzhan zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan tam/ yang dag par bskul lam/ yang dag par spro ba bskyed dam/ yang dag par dga' bar bya
263b2('bum): na| yang dag par rjes su song ba'i yid kyis gzhan yang dag par bstan par bya'o/ /yang dag par bskul bar bya'o/ /yang dag par spong bskyed pa bya'o/ /yang dag par dga' ba
263b3('bum): bskyed par bya'o/ /de'ang ci nas kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / tshul
263b4('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
263b5('bum): pa'i tshe/ bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni brtson 'grus
263b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
263b7('bum): spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog
264a1('bum): par mi 'gyur ba dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni nang stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / phyi stong pa
264a2('bum): nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni phyi stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod do
264a3('bum): zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba
264a4('bum): dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni chen po stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag
264a5('bum): ni don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod do/ /zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod do
264a6('bum): zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi
264a7('bum): 'gyur ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / thog
264b1('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la
264b2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid la
264b3('bum): spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par
264b4('bum): mi 'gyur ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / mi dmigs pa
264b5('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dngos
264b6('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par
264b7('bum): rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur
265a1('bum): ba dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur
265a2('bum): ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
265a3('bum): pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dbang
265a4('bum): po rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni stobs rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi
265a5('bum): 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'phags
265a6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i
265a7('bum): bden pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa'i
265b1('bum): tshe| bdag ni bsam gtan rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni tshad med pa rnams la spyod do zhes
265b2('bum): bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la
265b3('bum): spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi
265b4('bum): 'gyur ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam
265b5('bum): par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
265b6('bum): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni mngon par
265b7('bum): shes pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par
266a1('bum): rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi
266a2('bum): 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur
266a3('bum): ba dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
266a4('bum): rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / byams pa chen po la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag
266a5('bum): ni byams pa chen po la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni snying rje chen po la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog
266a6('bum): par mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par
266a7('bum): rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang /
266b1('bum): lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i
266b2('bum): 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dgra bcom
266b3('bum): pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rang byang chub la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rang byang chub la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang /
266b4('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
266b5('bum): nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de ltar yang dag par bstan par bya'o/ /yang dag par
266b6('bum): bskul bar bya'o/ /yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya'o/ /yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya ste/ de ltar spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos gzhan bla na med pa yang
266b7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan par bya'o/ /yang dag par bskul bar bya'o/ /yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya'o/ /yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o/ /
267a1('bum): de yang dag par bstan pa de dang / yang dag par bskul ba de dang / yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya ba de dang / yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya
267a2('bum): ba des gzhan yang dag par ston cing yang dag par bskul ba dang / yang dag par spro ba bskyed cing yang dag par dga' bar byed pa'i tshe/ rma 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas
267a3('bum): kyis gnang ba'i yang dag par bskul bas yang dag par bskul ba yin te/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spangs
267a4('bum): pa yin no/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgya go gcig pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs
267a5('bum): so| |zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa'i rnam pa de lta bu dag ston pa legs so legs so/ /rab
267a6('bum): 'byor/ de bas na khyod la chags pa'i rnam pa de bas kyang phra ba dag bstan par bya'i/ de dag shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang bstan par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/
267a7('bum): de ltar bgyi'o zhes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ 'di la rigs kyi
267b1('bum): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan
267b2('bum): mar yid la byed na/ rab 'byor/ ji tsam du mtshan mar gyur pa de srid du chags pa'o/ /gang yang 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
267b3('bum): p ar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chags pa thams cad dang bral ba de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa nas dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad
267b4('bum): mtshan mar yid la byed cing / yid la byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na/ rab 'byor/ ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du
267b5('bum): chags pa'o/ /gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de dag dang de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de thams cad kyang mtshan mar byas
267b6('bum): te| bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na/ rab 'byor/ ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs
267b7('bum): pa de dag ni mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab
268a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dben pa'i phyir ro/ /
268a2('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
268a3('bum): phyin pa ma byas/ mngon par 'du ma byas pa ste/ de ni sus kyang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya bar mi nus so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad ni mngon par sangs
268a4('bum): ma rgyas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis ma yin te/ chos kyi rang bzhin ni gcig tu zad do/ /rab 'byor/
268a5('bum): chos kyi rang bzhin gcig po gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin ma yin no/ /gang rang bzhin ma yin pa de ni ma byas pa'o/ /gang ma byas pa de ni mngon par 'du ma byas pa'o/ /rab
268a6('bum): 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos kyi rang bzhin gcig por rang bzhin ma yin pa ma byas pa mngon par 'du ma byas par shes na chags pa'i
268a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rtogs par dka' ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
268b1('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sus kyang ma mthong / ma thos/ ma rtogs/ rnam par ma shes/ mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa'i phyir ro/ /
268b2('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar sems kyis ma
268b3('bum): shes so/ /gzugs kyis ma shes so/ /tshor bas ma shes so/ /'du shes kyis ma shes so/ /'du byed kyis ma shes so/ /rnam par shes pas ma shes so/ /mig gis ma shes
268b4('bum): so| |rna bas ma shes so/ /snas ma shes so/ /lces ma shes so/ /lus kyis ma shes so/ /yid kyis ma shes so/ /gzugs kyis ma shes so/ /sgras ma shes so/ /dris ma shes
268b5('bum): so| |ros ma shes so/ /reg gis ma shes so/ /chos kyis ma shes so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pas ma shes so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pas
268b6('bum): ma shes so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pas ma shes so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pas ma shes so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so/ /
268b7('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas ma shes so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pas ma shes so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pas ma shes so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pas
269a1('bum): ma shes so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma shes so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma shes so/ /sna'i 'dus te
269a2('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma shes so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma shes so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma shes so/ /yid kyi 'dus te
269a3('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma shes so/ /sa'i khams kyis ma shes so/ /chu'i khams kyis ma shes so/ /me'i khams kyis ma shes so/ /rlung gi khams kyis ma shes so/ /nam
269a4('bum): mkha'i khams kyis ma shes so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis ma shes so/ /ma rig pas ma shes so/ /'du byed kyis ma shes so/ /rnam par shes pas ma shes so/ /ming
269a5('bum): dang gzugs kyis ma shes so/ /skye mched drug gis ma shes so/ /reg pas ma shes so/ /tshor bas ma shas so/ /sred pas ma shes so/ /len pas ma shes so/ /srid pas ma
269a6('bum): shes so/ /skye bas ma shes so/ /rga shis ma shes so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu
269a7('bum): phyin pas ma shes so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma shes so/ /
269b1('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyis ma
269b2('bum): shes so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
269b3('bum): kyis ma shes so/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /chos thams cad
269b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /ngo bo nyid
269b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis ma shes so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis ma
269b6('bum): shes so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis ma shes so/ /dbang po rnams kyis ma shes so/ /stobs rnams kyis ma shes so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis ma shes so/ /'phags
269b7('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ma shes so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis ma shes so/ /bsam gtan rnams kyis ma shes so/ /tshad med pa rnams kyis ma shes so/ /
270a1('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma shes so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis ma shes so/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
270a2('bum): dgus ma shes so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas ma shes so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ma shes so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams
270a3('bum): kyis ma shes so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis ma shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus ma shes so/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis ma shes so/ /so so yang dag par rig
270a4('bum): pa rnams kyis ma shes so/ /byams pa chen pos ma shes so/ /snying rje chen pos ma shes so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis ma shes so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
270a5('bum): bus ma shes so/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma shes so/ /phyar mi 'ong ba'o 'bras bus ma shes so/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyis ma shas so/ /rang byang chub kyis ma shes so/ /
270a6('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u nyi shu bdun
270a7('bum): pa'o/ / //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bgyid pa ma
270b1('bum): mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du gzugs mi dmigs pa dang / tshor ba mi dmigs
270b2('bum): pa dang / 'du shes mi dmigs pa dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / mig mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba mi dmigs pa dang / sna mi dmigs pa
270b3('bum): dang / lce mi dmigs pa dang / lus mi dmigs pa dang / yid mi dmigs pa dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa dang / sgra mi dmigs pa dang / dri mi dmigs pa dang / ro mi dmigs pa
270b4('bum): dang / reg mi dmigs pa dang / chos mi dmigs pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs
270b5('bum): pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs
270b6('bum): pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs
270b7('bum): pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa
271a1('bum): dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg
271a2('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / sa'i khams mi dmigs pa dang / chu'i khams mi dmigs pa dang /
271a3('bum): me'i khams mi dmigs pa dang / rlung gi khams mi dmigs pa dang / nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa dang / ma rig pa mi dmigs
271a4('bum): pa dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / ming dang gzugs mi dmigs pa dang / skye mched drug mi dmigs pa dang / reg pa mi dmigs pa
271a5('bum): dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / sred pa mi dmigs pa dang / len pa mi dmigs pa dang / srid pa mi dmigs pa dang / skye ba mi dmigs pa dang / rga shi mi dmigs pa dang / sbyin
271a6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
271a7('bum): pa mi dmigs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / phyi
271b1('bum): stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi
271b2('bum): dmigs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma
271b3('bum): med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / rang
271b4('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa
271b5('bum): dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa mi dmigs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba mi dmigs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mi dmigs
271b6('bum): pa dang / dbang po mi dmigs pa dang / stobs mi dmigs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag mi dmigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs pa dang / 'phags
271b7('bum): pa'i bden pa mi dmigs pa dang / bsam gtan mi dmigs pa dang / tshad med pa mi dmigs pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par thar
272a1('bum): pa brgyad mi dmigs pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
272a2('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa dang / mngon par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin mi dmigs pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo mi dmigs pa dang / de bzhin
272a3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs mi dmigs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa mi dmigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa mi dmigs pa dang / byams pa chen po mi dmigs pa dang / snying
272a4('bum): rje chen po mi dmigs pa dang / sangs rgya skyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
272a5('bum): bu mi dmigs pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang / rang byang chub mi dmigs pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
272a6('bum): nyid mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
272a7('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam pa ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
272b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya
272b2('bum): bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te
272b3('bum): gzugs bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod
272b4('bum): na| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi
272b5('bum): sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs med do/ /gal te tshor ba la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod
272b6('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba bdag
272b7('bum): ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
273a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug
273a2('bum): pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshor ba med do/ /gal te 'du shes la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du shes rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag
273a3('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du shes bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
273a4('bum): spyod do/ /gal te 'du shes bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du shes sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug
273a5('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag
273a6('bum): med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'du shes med do/ /gal te 'du byed la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du byed
273a7('bum): rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du byed bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes
273b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du byed bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du byed sdug ces bya
273b2('bum): ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam
273b3('bum): bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'du byed med do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam
273b4('bum): par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi
273b5('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal
273b6('bum): te rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am
273b7('bum): sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par shes pa med do/ /gal te mig la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
274a1('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mig rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mig bde
274a2('bum): zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mig bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes
274a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mig sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag
274a4('bum): pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal pa'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mig med do/ /gal te rna ba la mi spyod
274a5('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba bde zhes bya
274a6('bum): ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
274a7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag
274b1('bum): pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal pa'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rna ba med do/ /gal te sna la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
274b2('bum): la spyod do/ /gal te sna rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes
274b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug
274b4('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/
274b5('bum): sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sna med do/ /gal te lce la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod
274b6('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce bdag ces bya ba'am/
274b7('bum): bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i
275a1('bum): phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de
275a2('bum): lta bu'i lce med do/ /gal te lus la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
275a3('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med
275a4('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i
275a5('bum): phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus med do/ /gal te
275a6('bum): yid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te
275a7('bum): yid bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes
275b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag
275b2('bum): pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yid med do/ /gal te gzugs la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
275b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug
275b4('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
275b5('bum): gal te gzugs sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal
275b6('bum): ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs med do/ /gal te sgra la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sgra
275b7('bum): rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sgra bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
276a1('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sgra bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sgra sdug
276a2('bum): ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag
276a3('bum): gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgra med do/ /gal te dri la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dri rtag ces bya ba'am/
276a4('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dri bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
276a5('bum): do| |gal te dri bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dri sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na
276a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am
276a7('bum): mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dri med do/ /gal te ro la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ro rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab
276b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ro bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ro bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces
276b2('bum): bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ro sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag
276b3('bum): pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ro med do/ /gal te reg la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
276b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te reg rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te reg bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya
276b5('bum): bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te reg bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te reg sdug ces bya
276b6('bum): ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam
276b7('bum): bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i reg med do/ /gal te chos la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chos rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi
277a1('bum): rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chos bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
277a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chos bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chos sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi
277a3('bum): sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag
277a4('bum): gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos med do/ /gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal
277a5('bum): te mig gi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am/
277a6('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes
277a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
277b1('bum): na| gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mig gi rnam par shes pa med do/ /
277b2('bum): gal te rnam ba'i rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab
277b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i rnam
277b4('bum): par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar
277b5('bum): mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi
277b6('bum): sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med do/ /gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa rtag
277b7('bum): ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi
278a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
278a2('bum): spyod do/ /gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag
278a3('bum): pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sna'i rnam par shes pa med do/ /gal te lce'i rnam par
278a4('bum): shes pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
278a5('bum): la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa
278a6('bum): bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar
