278a7('bum): mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/
278b1('bum): sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lce'i rnam par shes pa med do/ /gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus
278b2('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal
278b3('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
278b4('bum): pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am
278b5('bum): mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus kyi rnam par shes pa med do/ /gal te yid kyi rnam
278b6('bum): par shes pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
278b7('bum): pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi rnam par shes
279a1('bum): pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba'am/
279a2('bum): mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag
279a3('bum): med pa'am/ sdug pa'am ma sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa med do/ /gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
279a4('bum): do| |gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya
279a5('bum): ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod
279a6('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i
279a7('bum): phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa
279b1('bum): med do/ /gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes
279b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i 'dus te
279b3('bum): reg pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ /mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod
279b4('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par
279b5('bum): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mad do/ /gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba'am/
279b6('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
279b7('bum): pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya
280a1('bum): ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal
280a2('bum): ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa med do/ /gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
280a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i 'dus te reg
280a4('bum): pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi
280a5('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de
280a6('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lce'i 'dus te reg
280a7('bum): pa med do/ /gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod
280b1('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal
280b2('bum): te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi
280b3('bum): sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/
280b4('bum): sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med do/ /gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi
280b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes
280b6('bum): bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
280b7('bum): spyod do| |gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag
281a1('bum): pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med do/ /
281a2('bum): gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rtag ces bya ba'am/
281a3('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod
281a4('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
281a5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i
281a6('bum): phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa
281a7('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba med do/ /gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las
281b1('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes bya ba'am/
281b2('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi
281b3('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
281b4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta
281b5('bum): bu'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med do/ /gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i 'dus
281b6('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes
281b7('bum): bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces
282a1('bum): bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar
282a2('bum): mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/
282a3('bum): sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med do/ /gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la mi spyod na shes rab kyi
282a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
282a5('bum): gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i 'dus te
282a6('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
282a7('bum): tshor ba sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug
282b1('bum): bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med do/ /gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las
282b2('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes
282b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
282b4('bum): la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi
282b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/
282b6('bum): bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med do/ /gal te yid kyi
282b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces
283a1('bum): bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes
283a2('bum): bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes
283a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
283a4('bum): spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yid
283a5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med do/ /gal te sa'i khams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sa'i khams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag
283a6('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sa'i khams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
283a7('bum): spyod do/ /gal te sa'i khams bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sa'i khams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi
283b1('bum): sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/
283b2('bum): sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sa'i khams med do/ /gal te chu'i khams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chu'i khams rtag ces bya ba'am/
283b3('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chu'i khams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
283b4('bum): spyod do| |gal te chu'i khams bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chu'i khams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya
283b5('bum): bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am
283b6('bum): mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chu'i khams med do/ /gal te me'i khams la ma spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te me'i khams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya
283b7('bum): bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te me'i khams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te
284a1('bum): me'i khams bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te me'i khams sdug ces bya ba'am/
284a2('bum): mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med
284a3('bum): pa'am| sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i me'i khams med do/ /gal te rlung gi khams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rlung gi khams rtag
284a4('bum): ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rlung gi khams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
284a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rlung gi khams bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rlung gi khams sdug ces bya
284a6('bum): ba'am| mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam
284a7('bum): bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rlung gi khams med do/ /gal te nam mkha'i khams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal
284b1('bum): te nam mkha'i khams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te nam mkha'i khams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya
284b2('bum): bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te nam mkha'i khams bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te
284b3('bum): nam mkha'i khams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug
284b4('bum): bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i nam mkha'i khams med do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
284b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams
284b6('bum): bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod
284b7('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir
285a1('bum): zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
285a2('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgya go gnyis pa/ gal te ma rig pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi
285a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ma rig pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ma rig pa bde zhes bya ba'am/
285a4('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ma rig pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
285a5('bum): la spyod do/ /gal te ma rig pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/
285a6('bum): bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ma rig pa med do/ /gal te 'du byed la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
285a7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du byed rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du byed bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug
285b1('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du byed bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
285b2('bum): spyod do/ /gal te 'du byed sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am
285b3('bum): sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'du byed med do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
285b4('bum): pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug
285b5('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
285b6('bum): la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag
285b7('bum): pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par shes pa med do/ /gal te ming dang gzugs la
286a1('bum): mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ming dang gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
286a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ming dang gzugs bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ming dang gzugs bdag
286a3('bum): ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ming dang gzugs sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi
286a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
286a5('bum): ming dang gzugs med do/ /gal te skye mched drug la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye mched drug rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na
286a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye mched drug bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye
286a7('bum): mched drug bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye mched drug sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi
286b1('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am
286b2('bum): mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i skye mched drug med do/ /gal te reg pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te reg pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar
286b3('bum): mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te reg pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te reg pa
286b4('bum): bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te reg pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
286b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba
286b6('bum): de lta bu'i reg pa med do/ /gal te tshor ba la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
286b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med
287a1('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
287a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta
287a3('bum): bu'i tshor ba med do/ /gal te sred pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sred pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
287a4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sred pa bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sred pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag
287a5('bum): med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sred pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
287a6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sred pa med
287a7('bum): do| |gal te len pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te len pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
287b1('bum): la spyod do/ /gal te len pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te len pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces
287b2('bum): bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te len pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir
287b3('bum): zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i len pa med do/ /gal te srid
287b4('bum): pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te srid pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te srid
287b5('bum): pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te srid pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes
287b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te srid pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am
287b7('bum): mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i srid pa med do/ /gal te skye ba la mi spyod na shes rab kyi
288a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye ba rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye ba bde
288a2('bum): zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye ba bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
288a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye ba sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am
288a4('bum): mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i skye ba med do/ /gal te rga shi la mi spyod na
288a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rga shi rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rga shi bde
288a6('bum): zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rga shi bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab
288a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rga shi sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am
288b1('bum): mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rga shi med do/ /gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
288b2('bum): mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal
288b3('bum): te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba'am/
288b4('bum): bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
288b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
288b6('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gal te tshul khrims kyis pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces
288b7('bum): bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes
289a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
289a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/

289a4('bum): do| |gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod

289a7('bum): bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam
289b1('bum): bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

289b6('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
289b7('bum): pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
290a1('bum): mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod

290b1('bum): rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur pa de lta bu'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do/ /gal te nang stong

290b3('bum): te nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya
290b4('bum): bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te nang stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir

290b6('bum): te phyi stong pa nyid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te phyi stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

291b1('bum): la spyod do/ /gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am/

291b6('bum): spyod do/ /gal te chen po stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chen po stong pa nyid bdag ces bya

292b1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag

293b1('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te thog ma dang

293b4('bum): pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med do/ /gal te dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
293b5('bum): do/ /gal te dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am/
293b6('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
293b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag
294a1('bum): pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dor ba med pa stong
294a2('bum): pa nyid med do/ /gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi
294a3('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
294a4('bum): gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug ces bya
294a5('bum): ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam
294a6('bum): bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid med do/ /gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
294a7('bum): la spyod do/ /gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid
294b1('bum): bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chos thams cad ston pa nyid bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar
294b2('bum): mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
294b3('bum): do| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos thams
294b4('bum): cad stong pa nyid med do/ /gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi
294b5('bum): rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
294b6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rang gi mtshan
294b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug
295a1('bum): bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rang gi mchan nyid stong pa nyid med do/ /gal te mi dmigs
295a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
295a3('bum): pa la spyod do/ /gal te mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mi dmigs pa stong pa
295a4('bum): nyid bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya
295a5('bum): bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/
295a6('bum): sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med do/ /gal te dngos po mad pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te
295a7('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am/
295b1('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
295b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang
295b3('bum): rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med do/ /gal te
295b4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
295b5('bum): pa la spyod do/ /gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya
295b6('bum): ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
295b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur
296a1('bum): ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do/ /gal te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te
296a2('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
296a3('bum): bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med
296a4('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
296a5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba
296a6('bum): de lta bu'i dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med do/ /gal te dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dran pa nye bar
296a7('bum): bzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug
296b1('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi
296b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
296b3('bum): na| gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
296b4('bum): med do/ /gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod
296b5('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
296b6('bum): do| |gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams
296b7('bum): sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/
297a1('bum): bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yang dag par spong ba rnams med do/ /gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
297a2('bum): la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
297a3('bum): do| |gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag
297a4('bum): ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na
297a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am
297a6('bum): mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med do/ /gal te dbang po rnams la mi spyod na shas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dbang po rnams
297a7('bum): rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dbang po rnams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na
297b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dbang po rnams bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te
297b2('bum): dbang po rnams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am
297b3('bum): sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dbang po rnams med do/ /gal te stobs rnams la mi spyod na shes rab
297b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te stobs rnams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te stobs rnams bde
297b5('bum): zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te stobs rnams bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod
297b6('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te stobs rnams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i
297b7('bum): phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i stobs rnams
298a1('bum): med do/ /gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rtag
298a2('bum): ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi
298a3('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
298a4('bum): la spyod do/ /gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /da ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag
298a5('bum): pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med do/ /
298a6('bum): gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi
298a7('bum): rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na
298b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
298b2('bum): gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag
298b3('bum): pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med do/ /gal te 'phags
298b4('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
298b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'phags pa'i bden
298b6('bum): pa rnams bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi
298b7('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am
299a1('bum): mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med do/ /gal te bsam gtan rnams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
299a2('bum): spyod do/ /gal te bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bsam gtan rnams bde zhes bya ba'am/

299a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te bsam gtan rnams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang
299a5('bum): rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bsam gtan rnams med do/ /
299a6('bum): gal te tshad med pa rnams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshad med pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
299a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshad med pa rnams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshad med pa rnams
299b1('bum): bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshad med pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab
299b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur
299b3('bum): ba de lta bu'i tshad med pa rnams med do/ /gal te gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs med pa'i
299b4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
299b5('bum): bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag ces bya ba'am/
299b6('bum): bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi
299b7('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug
300a1('bum): pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad la mi spyod na shes rab
300a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam
300a3('bum): par thar pa brgyad bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag
300a4('bum): med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
300a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de
300a6('bum): lta bu'i rnam par thar pa brgyad med do/ /gal te mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mthar gyis
300a7('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
300b1('bum): par 'jug pa dgu bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdag
300b2('bum): ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug
300b3('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/
300b4('bum): sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu med do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
300b5('bum): med pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya
300b6('bum): bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal
300b7('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med
301a1('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
301a2('bum): sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal pa'am/
301a3('bum): bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur bde lta bu'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med do/ /gal te mngon
301a4('bum): par shes pa rnams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
301a5('bum): pa la spyod do/ /gal te mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mngon par shes pa rnams
301a6('bum): bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mngon par shes pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes
301a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par
301b1('bum): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mngon par shes pa rnams med do/ /gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces bya ba'am/
301b2('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
301b3('bum): la spyod do/ /gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug ces bya'am/
301b4('bum): mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med
301b5('bum): pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnams med do/ /gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzungs kyi
301b6('bum): sgo rnams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi
301b7('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal
302a1('bum): te gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag
302a2('bum): pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams med do/ /gal te
302a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces
302a4('bum): bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
302a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal
302a6('bum): te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi
302a7('bum): rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med do/ /
302b1('bum): gal te mi 'jigs pa rnams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mi 'jigs pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
302b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mi 'jigs pa rnams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mi 'jigs pa rnams
302b3('bum): bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mi 'jigs pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na
302b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug
302b5('bum): par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mi 'jigs pa rnams med do/ /gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te so so yang dag par
302b6('bum): rig pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal
302b7('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
303a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
303a2('bum): spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i so so yang
303a3('bum): dag par rig pa rnams med do/ /gal te byams pa chen po la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te byams pa chen po rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar
303a4('bum): mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te byams pa chen po bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
303a5('bum): gal te byams pa chen po bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te byams pa chen po sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi
303a6('bum): sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag
303a7('bum): med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byams pa chen po med do/ /gal te snying rje chen po la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te snying
303b1('bum): rje chen po rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te snying rje chen po bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod
303b2('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te snying rje chen po bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te snying rje
303b3('bum): chen po sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal
303b4('bum): ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i snying rje chen po med do/ /gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi spyod na shes
303b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal
303b6('bum): te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
303b7('bum): rnams bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces
304a1('bum): bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/
304a2('bum): bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med do/ /gal te thams cad shes pa nyid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
304a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te thams cad shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te thams cad shes
304a4('bum): pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te thams cad shes pa nyid bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces
304a5('bum): bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te thams cad shes pa nyid sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
304a6('bum): la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
304a7('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid med do/ /gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am mi
304b1('bum): rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
304b2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes
304b3('bum): pa nyid sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/
304b4('bum): bdag gam bdag med pa'am/ sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med do/ /gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
304b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam pa thams cad
304b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag
304b7('bum): med ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
305a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa'am/
305a2('bum): sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgya go
305a3('bum): gsum pa/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs so
305a4('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no/ /zhes bya ba de ltar yang
305a5('bum): mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
305a6('bum): tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du shes yongs su ma rdzogs
305a7('bum): so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du shes yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'du shes ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar
305b1('bum): yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te 'du byed yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du
305b2('bum): byed yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par shes pa yongs su ma
305b3('bum): rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no
305b4('bum): zhe bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mig yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de
305b5('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de mig ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba yongs su ma
305b6('bum): rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rna ba ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi
305b7('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna yongs su ma rdzogs
306a1('bum): pa gang yin pa de sna ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod
306a2('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lce ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
306a3('bum): spyod do/ /gal te lus yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lus
306a4('bum): ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
306a5('bum): do| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de yid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs yongs
306a6('bum): su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no zhes bya ba
306a7('bum): de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sgra yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir
306b1('bum): zhe na/ sgra yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sgra ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te dri yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar
306b2('bum): mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dri yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dri ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
306b3('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ro yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ro yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ro
306b4('bum): ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te reg yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
306b5('bum): do| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ reg yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de reg ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te chos yongs
306b6('bum): su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de chos ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang
306b7('bum): mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de
307a1('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na
307a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
307a3('bum): na| rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /
307a4('bum): gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs
307a5('bum): pa gang yin pa de sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs so
307a6('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lce'i rnam par shes pa ma
307a7('bum): yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi
307b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod
307b2('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe

307b6('bum): ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
307b7('bum): ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
308a1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang
308a2('bum): mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe

308a4('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs
308a5('bum): pa gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs
308a6('bum): so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin
308a7('bum): no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes
308b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
308b2('bum): ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na

315b2('bum): rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de bsam gtan rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshad med pa rnams
315b3('bum): yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshad med pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de tshad med pa
315b4('bum): rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes
315b5('bum): bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzugs med
315b6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs so
315b7('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa brgyad ma yin no
316a1('bum): zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su ma
316a2('bum): rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang

316a5('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
316a6('bum): ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi

316b1('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe

322b3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
322b4('bum): pa'i tshe/ gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
322b5('bum): gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
322b6('bum): gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal
322b7('bum): te thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
323a1('bum): tshe| gal te dor ba med pa stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi
323a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
323a3('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
323a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
323a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
323a6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dngos po med pa stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
323a7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
323b1('bum): pa'i tshe/ gal te dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
323b2('bum): pa'i tshe/ gal te dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
323b3('bum): tshe| gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
323b4('bum): tshe| gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
323b5('bum): tshe| gal te dbang po rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te
323b6('bum): stobs rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te byang chub
323b7('bum): kyi yan lag rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'phags
324a1('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol
324a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha
324a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bsam gtan rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol
324a4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te tshad med pa rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu

324a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes
324a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
324b1('bum): la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar
324b2('bum): mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod
