325a1('bum): phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te byams pa chen po chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes
325a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te snying rje chen po chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
325a3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes
325a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te thams cad shes pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab
325a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi
325a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes
325a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na gzugs chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /

329a3('bum): bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ bstan kyang mi 'phel/
329a4('bum): ma bstan kyang mi 'phel ba ngo mtshar che'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no/ /rab 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su
329a5('bum): mi 'grib/ ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ bstan kyang mi 'phel/ ma bstan kyang mi 'phel lo/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
329a6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs shing nam mkha'i legs pa'am ma legs pa brjod kyang / nam mkha' ni legs pa brjod pas yongs su 'grib
329a7('bum): pa med do/ /nyes pa brjod kyang yongs su 'grib pa med do/ /nam mkha' ni legs pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do/ /nyes pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/
329b1('bum): dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni legs pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do/ /nyes pa brjod kyang yongs su 'grib pa med do/ /legs pa brjod kyang chags par 'gyur ba med do/ /nyes pa
329b2('bum): brjod kyang khong khro bar 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de bstan kyang de bzhin/ ma bstan kyang de bzhin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
329b3('bum): 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i tshe/ zhum pa dang g.yeng bar mi 'gyur ba
329b4('bum): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtson par bgyid cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/
329b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nam mkha' bsgom pa ste/ nam mkha' la
329b6('bum): ni gzugs ma mchis so/ /tshor ba ma mchis so/ /'du shes ma mchis so/ /'du byed ma mchis so/ /rnam par shes pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni mig ma mchis so/ /
329b7('bum): rna ba ma mchis so/ /sna ma mchis so/ /lce ma mchis so/ /lus ma mchis so/ /yid ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni gzugs ma mchis so/ /sgra ma mchis so/ /dri ma
330a1('bum): mchis so/ /ro ma mchis so/ /reg ma mchis so/ /chos ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni mig gi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma
330a2('bum): mchis so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so/ /
330a3('bum): nam mkha' la ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so/ /
330a4('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te
330a5('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so/ /lus kyi 'dus
330a6('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni sa'i khams ma mchis so/ /chu'i khams ma
330a7('bum): mchis so/ /me'i khams ma mchis so/ /rlung gi khams ma mchis so/ /nam mkha'i khams ma mchis so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni
330b1('bum): ma rig pa ma mchis so/ /'du byed ma mchis so/ /rnam par shes pa ma mchis so/ /ming dang gzugs ma mchis so/ /skye mched drug ma mchis so/ /reg pa ma mchis so/ /tshor ba
330b2('bum): ma mchis so/ /sred pa ma mchis so/ /len pa ma mchis so/ /srid pa ma mchis so/ /skye ba ma mchis so/ /rga shi ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
330b3('bum): pa ma mchis so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so/ /bsam gtan
330b4('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /phyi stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /phyi nang
330b5('bum): stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /chen po stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid ma mchis
330b6('bum): so| |'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /dor ba med pa stong pa
330b7('bum): nyid ma mchis so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa
331a1('bum): nyid ma mchis so/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma
331a2('bum): mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma mchis so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams ma mchis so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma mchis so/ /dbang
331a3('bum): po rnams ma mchis so/ /stobs rnams ma mchis so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma mchis so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma mchis so/ /'phags
331a4('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams ma mchis so/ /bsam gtan rnams ma mchis so/ /tshad med pa rnams ma mchis so/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma mchis
331a5('bum): so| |rnam par thar pa brgyad ma mchis so/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma mchis so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
331a6('bum): dang / /smon pa med pa ma mchis so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ma mchis so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma mchis so/ /nam mkha'
331a7('bum): la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma mchis so/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma mchis so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma mchis so/ /byams pa chen po ma mchis
331b1('bum): so| |snying rje chen po ma mchis so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis so/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong
331b2('bum): ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis so/ /dgra bcom pa nyid ma mchis so/ /rang byang chub ma mchis so/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
331b3('bum): chub ma mchis so/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgya go bzhi pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
331b4('bum): dpa' chen po gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni/ phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha'i don du brtson par mos/ 'bad
331b5('bum): par mos/ rtsol bar mos pa dag ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang gis sems can rnams kyi slad du/ go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su smin par 'tshal zhing / yongs
331b6('bum): su grol bar 'tshal ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams kyi slad du/ go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni go cha chen po
331b7('bum): 'tshal ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can rnams kyi don du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' bar snang la 'deg par 'tshal ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa'
332a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni brtson 'grus chen
332a2('bum): po thob pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa de
332a3('bum): dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams kyi slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
332a4('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni/ dpa' bo bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal ba'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/
332a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi
332a6('bum): tshal lam/ smyig ma'i tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til gyi zhing bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongs su gang bar gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
332a7('bum): gis kyang bskal ba'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa yongs su mya ngan las
332b1('bum): 'das kyang / bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa'am gang bar mi gda'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa dang sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ de
332b2('bum): bzhin du gal te phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram
332b3('bum): shing gi tshal lam/ smyig ma'i tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til gyi zhing bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongs su gang bar gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
332b4('bum): gis kyang bskal pa'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang /
332b5('bum): sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa'am gang bar mi gda'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs
332b6('bum): des na/ bdag 'di skad du sems can rnams kyi slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha'
332b7('bum): yongs su smin par bgyi bar 'tshal zhing / yongs su dgrol bar 'tshal ba lags zhes mchi'o/ /de nas dge slong gcig cig 'di snyam du gyur te/ gang la chos gang yang
333a1('bum): skye ba dang 'gags pa'ang med la/ tshul khrims kyi phung po'ang yod/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po'ang yod/ shes rab kyi phung po'ang yod/ rnam
333a2('bum): par grol ba'i phung po'ang yod/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'ang yod/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang yod/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang yod/
333a3('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang yod/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang yod/ rang byang chub kyang yod/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod/ rgyun du zhugs pa'ang
333a4('bum): yod/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'ang yod/ phyir mi 'ong ba'ang yod/ dgra bcom pa'ang yod/ rang sangs rgyas kyang yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
333a5('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yod/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang yod/ chos dkon mchog kyang yod/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang yod/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang yod
333a6('bum): pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
333a7('bum): smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtson par byed pa zhig yod na/ de gang la
333b1('bum): brtson par byed pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par sems pa de ni/ nam mkha' stong pa la brtson pa'o/ /de nas lha'i
333b2('bum): dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa
333b3('bum): dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdag gis bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab pa ji lta bu zhig bgyi/ bcom
333b4('bum): ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka/ khyod kyis gang la bsrung ba dang /
333b5('bum): bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ bdag gis gang la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bya
333b6('bum): ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
333b7('bum): phyin pa la gnas na de nyid de'i bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par 'gyur ro/ /gal te ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar gyur na/ de la mi'am
334a1('bum): mi ma yin pa glags 'tshol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /gang ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
334a2('bum): la mi gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o/ /kau shi ka/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
334a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de ni nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang / bskyang
334a4('bum): ba dang / bskyab par sems pa ste/ de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing / dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis sgyu ma
334a5('bum): dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / sprul pa la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par nus sam/ brgya
334a6('bum): byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de ni mi nus so/ /smras pa/ kau shi ka/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
334a7('bum): spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing / dub pa'i skal pa can du 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ khyod
334b1('bum): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de ni mi nus so/ /
334b2('bum): smras pa/ kau shi ka/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang
334b3('bum): sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing / dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /ko shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de
334b4('bum): bzhin nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de ni mi nus so/ /
334b5('bum): smras pa/ kau shi ka/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang
334b6('bum): sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing / dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun
334b7('bum): pa rab 'byor/ ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ rmi lam lta bu'i chos dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu
335a1('bum): lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i chos rnams yongs su shes pa dang / de ltar yongs
335a2('bum): su shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems
335a3('bum): su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom
335a4('bum): sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra
335a5('bum): brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor
335a6('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer
335a7('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul
335b1('bum): pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras
335b2('bum): pa| kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs kyis rlom sems
335b3('bum): su mi byed/ gzugs bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/
335b4('bum): rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes
335b5('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/
335b6('bum): smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ /sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan
335b7('bum): la rlom sems su ma byed do/ /de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la
336a1('bum): rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes
336a2('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom
336a3('bum): sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor
336a4('bum): ba rlom sems su mi byed/ tshor bas rlom sems su mi byed/ tshor ba bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ tshor ba la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi
336a5('bum): byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom
336a6('bum): sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig
336a7('bum): rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan bdag

336b2('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag

336b5('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ 'du shes kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ 'du shes bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ 'du shes la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su
336b6('bum): mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas
336b7('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/

337a2('bum): sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems

337a4('bum): sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom
337a5('bum): sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
337a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed rlom sems su mi byed/ 'du byed kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ 'du byed bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/
337a7('bum): 'du byed la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la
337b1('bum): rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu
337b2('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/
337b3('bum): sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom
337b4('bum): sems su mi byed/ mig yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis
337b5('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom
337b6('bum): sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
337b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pas rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi
338a1('bum): byed/ rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes

344b1('bum): mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su
344b2('bum): mi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de mig
344b3('bum): yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de dri za'i grong khyer rlom
344b4('bum): sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems
344b5('bum): su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
344b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos rlom sems su mi byed/ chos kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ chos bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ chos la rlom
344b7('bum): sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma
345a1('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de smig
345a2('bum): rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ mig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems
345a3('bum): su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de mig yor rlom sems
345a4('bum): su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems
345a5('bum): su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa
345a6('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang
345a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mig gi rnam par shes pa rlom sems su mi byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pas rlom
345b1('bum): sems su mi byed/ mig gi rna par shes pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi
345b2('bum): byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas
345b3('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/
345b4('bum): smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ smig sgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan bdag
345b5('bum): gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor bdag gi zhes
345b6('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag
345b7('bum): gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi
346a1('bum): zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
346a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rlom sems su mi byed/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pas rlom sems su mi byed/ rna ba'i rnam par shes
346a3('bum): pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/
346a4('bum): rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag
346a5('bum): gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom
346a6('bum): sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems

346b3('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
346b4('bum): tshe| sna'i rnam par shes pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sna'i rnam par shes pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sna'i rnam par shes pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sna'i
346b5('bum): rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la

347b6('bum): pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
347b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa rlom sems su mi byed/ lus kyi rnam par shes pas rlom sems su mi byed/ lus kyi rnam
348a1('bum): par shes pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/
348a2('bum): rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom

348b2('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa rlom sems su mi byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pas rlom sems su mi byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes

349a2('bum): khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul
349a3('bum): bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
349a4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa rlom sems su mi byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pas rlom sems su mi byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa bdag gi zhes rlom
349a5('bum): sems su mi byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi
349a6('bum): zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems

349b5('bum): sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa

350b7('bum): grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/

351a3('bum): sems su mi byed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/

351b1('bum): sems su mi byed/ mig yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis

351b3('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau sha ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
351b4('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rlom sems su mi byed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pas rlom sems su mi byed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg
351b5('bum): pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi
351b6('bum): lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi
351b7('bum): zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rloms
352a1('bum): sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra
352a2('bum): brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/
352a3('bum): mig yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom
352a4('bum): sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/
352a5('bum): sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa'
352a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rlom sems su mi byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pas rlom sems su mi
352a7('bum): byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam
352b1('bum): gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems

353a1('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rlom sems su mi byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las
353a2('bum): byung ba'i tshor bas rlom sems su mi byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba

353b3('bum): do| |kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rlom sems
353b4('bum): su mi byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bas rlom sems su mi byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rna

357a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chu'i khams rlom sems su mi byed/ chu'i khams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ chu'i khams bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ chu'i khams la rlom

358a7('bum): rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rlung gi khams rlom sems su mi byed/ rlung gi khams
358b1('bum): kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rlung gi khams bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rlung gi khams la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems

359a1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam mkha'i khams rlom sems su mi byed/ nam mkha'i khams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ nam mkha'i khams bdag gi zhes rlom
359a2('bum): sems su mi byed/ nam mkha'i khams la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi
359a3('bum): byed| rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /

365b2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ skye ba rlom sems su mi byed/ skye bas rlom sems su mi byed/ skye ba bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ skye ba la rlom sems su
365b3('bum): mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems
365b4('bum): su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su
365b5('bum): mi byed/ smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi
365b6('bum): zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi

366a3('bum): shis rlom sems su mi byed/ rga shi bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rga shi la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/

366b3('bum): phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgya go lnga pa/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
366b4('bum): pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sbyin pa'i pha rul tu phyin pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom

372a4('bum): su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/
372a5('bum): sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chen po
372a6('bum): stong pa nyid rlom sems su mi byed/ chen po stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ chen po stong pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ chen po stong pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed na/
372a7('bum): de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems
372b1('bum): su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig

374a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rlom sems su mi byed/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid

374b1('bum): pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
374b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rlom sems su mi byed/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag
374b3('bum): gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes

375a3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rlom sems su mi byed/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ thog
375a4('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam

377a7('bum): su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang gi mtshan
377b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid rlom sems su mi byed/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rang gi mtshan nyid

377b6('bum): yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong
377b7('bum): khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes
378a1('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
378a2('bum): pa'i tshe/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rlom sems su mi byed/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/

378b1('bum): su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul
378b2('bum): pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
378b3('bum): pa'i tshe/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rlom sems su mi byed/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi
378b4('bum): byed/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi
378b5('bum): byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems
378b6('bum): su mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgra
378b7('bum): brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de mig yor rlom
379a1('bum): sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de dri za'i grong
379a2('bum): khyer rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa
379a3('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ /sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems
379a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rlom sems su mi byed/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ ngo bo nyid
379a5('bum): stong pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag
379a6('bum): gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/
379a7('bum): sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi
379b1('bum): byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de mig yor rlom sems
379b2('bum): su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i
379b3('bum): grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom
379b4('bum): sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
379b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rlom sems su mi byed/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
379b6('bum): pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi
379b7('bum): byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom
380a1('bum): sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi

380a3('bum): sems su mi byed do/ /de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi
380a4('bum): byed do/ /de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom
380a5('bum): sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /
380a6('bum): kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams rlom sems su mi byed/ dran pa nye
380a7('bum): bar bzhag pa rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la rlom sems su mi byed
380b1('bum): na| de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/

380b6('bum): za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su
380b7('bum): mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba rnams rlom sems su mi byed/ yang dag
381a1('bum): par spong ba rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ yang dag pa stong pa rnam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la rlom sems su
381a2('bum): mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom

381b1('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi
381b2('bum): rkang pa rnams rlom sems su mi byed/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
381b3('bum): la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /

383a5('bum): su mi byed/ byang chub kyi yang lag rnams bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam

383b5('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rlom sems su mi byed/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag

385b1('bum): sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad med pa rnams rlom sems su mi byed/ tshad med pa
385b2('bum): rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ tshad med pa rnams bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ tshad med pa rnams la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam
385b3('bum): gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma
385b4('bum): bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su
385b5('bum): mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan
385b6('bum): la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems
385b7('bum): su mi byed do/ /de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom
386a1('bum): sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems
386a2('bum): su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rlom sems
386a3('bum): su mi byed/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs
386a4('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su
386a5('bum): mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems
386a6('bum): su mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgra
386a7('bum): brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de mig yor rlom
386b1('bum): sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su mi byed/ dri
386b2('bum): za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas
386b3('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
386b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa brgyad rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par thar pa brgyad bdag gi zhes rlom sems
386b5('bum): su mi byed/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi
386b6('bum): byed| rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed
386b7('bum): do| |de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems
387a1('bum): su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de mig yor rlom sems
387a2('bum): su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su mi byed/
387a3('bum): dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/
387a4('bum): sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
387a5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rlom sems su mi byed/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
387a6('bum): dgus rlom sems su mi byed/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la rlom
387a7('bum): sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /
387b1('bum): de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus
387b2('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/
387b3('bum): sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor bdag gi
387b4('bum): zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag
387b5('bum): gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems
387b6('bum): su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo
387b7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas rlom sems su mi byed/
388a1('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
388a2('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su
388a3('bum): mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi

388a7('bum): dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su mi
388b1('bum): byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
388b2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams rlom sems su mi byed/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mngon par
388b3('bum): shes pa rnams bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mngon par shes pa rnams la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi
388b4('bum): byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes
388b5('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/

388b7('bum): rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems
389a1('bum): su mi byed do/ /de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri
389a2('bum): za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems
389a3('bum): su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin rnams rlom sems su mi byed/ ting nge
389a4('bum): 'dzin rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems
389a5('bum): su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas
389a6('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig

389b1('bum): sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/
389b2('bum): mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri
389b3('bum): za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems
389b4('bum): su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams rlom sems su mi byed/ gzungs kyi
389b5('bum): sgo rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs kyi sgo rnams bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi
389b6('bum): byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems
389b7('bum): su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu bdag gi
390a1('bum): zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan bdag
390a2('bum): gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor bdag gi zhes rlom
390a3('bum): sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes

390a5('bum): mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa
390a6('bum): pa'i stobs bcu rlom sems su mi byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus rlom sems su mi byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ de
390a7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/
390b1('bum): rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de
390b2('bum): smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/

390b5('bum): sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su
390b6('bum): mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
390b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi rlom sems su mi byed/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis rlom sems su mi byed/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mi
391a1('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi
391a2('bum): byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su
391a3('bum): mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom
