391a5('bum): mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i
391a6('bum): grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul
391a7('bum): pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
391b1('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rlom sems su mi byed/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis rlom sems su mi byed/ so so yang dag par rig
391b2('bum): pa bzhi bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi
391b3('bum): lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su
391b4('bum): mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom
391b5('bum): sems su mi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /
391b6('bum): de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de dri za'i grong
391b7('bum): khyer rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul
392a1('bum): pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/
392a2('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po rlom sems su mi byed/ byams pa chen pos rlom sems su mi
392a3('bum): byed| byams pa chen po bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ byams pa chen po la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi
392a4('bum): byed| rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi
392a5('bum): zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi
392a6('bum): byed| smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan
392a7('bum): la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom
392b1('bum): sems su mi byed do/ /de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom
392b2('bum): sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/
392b3('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ snying rje chen po rlom sems su mi byed/ snying rje chen pos rlom sems su mi byed/ snying
392b4('bum): rje chen po bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ snying rje chen po la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes
392b5('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la
392b6('bum): rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /
392b7('bum): de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de mig yor rlom sems
393a1('bum): su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de dri za'i grong khyer
393a2('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa
393a3('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems
393a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rlom sems su mi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
393a5('bum): brgyad kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu brgyad bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rlom sems
393a6('bum): su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de
393a7('bum): sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi
393b1('bum): byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su
393b2('bum): mi byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor
393b3('bum): bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer
393b4('bum): bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems
393b5('bum): su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thams cad shes pa nyid rlom
393b6('bum): sems su mi byed/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ thams cad shes pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ thams cad shes pa nyid la rlom sems su mi
393b7('bum): byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems
394a1('bum): su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/
394a2('bum): smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems
394a3('bum): su mi byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/
394a4('bum): mig yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed/
394a5('bum): dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa
394a6('bum): bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
394a7('bum): tshe| lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rlom sems su mi byed/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/
394b1('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la
394b2('bum): rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu
394b3('bum): rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra
394b4('bum): brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de mig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems
394b5('bum): su mi byed/ mig yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de dri za'i grong khyer rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su
394b6('bum): mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul
394b7('bum): pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
395a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa bdag gi
395a2('bum): zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi
395a3('bum): zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma
395a4('bum): la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de smig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed
395a5('bum): do| |de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de mig
395a6('bum): yor rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de dri za'i grong khyer rlom
395a7('bum): sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ dri za'i grong khyer la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de sprul pa rlom
395b1('bum): sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ /sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
395b2('bum): stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgya go drug pa/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum
395b3('bum): gyi lha dang / mche ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang / tshangs pa kun
395b4('bum): 'khor gyi lha dang / tshangs chen gyi lha dang / snang ba'i lha dang / chung snang gi lha dang / tshad med snang ba'i lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge ba'i lha dang / chung dge'i lha dang / tshad
395b5('bum): med dge ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / che ba'i lha dang / chung che'i lha dang / tshad med che ba'i lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / mi che ba'i lha dang / mi gdung ba'i lha dang / shin
395b6('bum): tu mthong ba'i lha dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha dang / 'og min gyi lha gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
395b7('bum): 'thor zhing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dang ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas rgyal po chen
396a1('bum): po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang /
396a2('bum): gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rang 'byor zhes bya
396a3('bum): ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
396a4('bum): phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/ /lho phyogs kyis sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong
396a5('bum): rab 'byor zhes bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/
396a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/ /nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan
396a7('bum): 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor zhes bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang /
396b1('bum): de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/ /byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid
396b2('bum): kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor zhes bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
396b3('bum): le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/ /byang shar gyi phyogs
396b4('bum): mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor zhes bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
396b5('bum): 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongs su dri ba sems
396b6('bum): la snang bar gyur to/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor zhes bya ba sha stag gis/
396b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u
397a1('bum): 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di
397a2('bum): dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor zhes bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de
397a3('bum): na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong
397a4('bum): yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor zhes bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab
397a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur
397a6('bum): to| |'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor zhes bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol
397a7('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu
397b1('bum): zhing / yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/ /steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di dag nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor zhes bya ba
397b2('bum): sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
397b3('bum): pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongs su dri ba sems la snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub
397b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'ang sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
397b5('bum): 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /gang yang bskal ba bzang po 'di la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba de dag kyang /
397b6('bum): sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /gsol
397b7('bum): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pa gang dang / rtags gang dang / mtshan ma gang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
398a1('bum): byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
398a2('bum): dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'di la/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
398a3('bum): tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi
398a4('bum): 'gyur ro/ /gzugs bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs
398a5('bum): zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi
398a6('bum): 'gyur ro/ /gzugs ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya
398a7('bum): bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston
398b1('bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba bcings zhes bya ba'am
398b2('bum): grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba da ltar byung zhes bya bar
398b3('bum): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'du shes rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'du shes bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur
398b4('bum): ro| |'du shes bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'du shes sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'du shes zhi
398b5('bum): zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'du shes bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'du shes 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par
398b6('bum): mi 'gyur ro/ /'du shes ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'du shes da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'du byed rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya
398b7('bum): bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'du byed bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'du byed bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston
399a1('bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ /'du byed sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'du byed zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur
399a2('bum): ro| |'du byed bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'du byed 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'du byed ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par
399a3('bum): mi 'gyur ro/ /'du byed da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa
399a4('bum): bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes
399a5('bum): pa sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa bcings
399a6('bum): zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston
399a7('bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mig rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mig bde
399b1('bum): zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mig bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mig sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces
399b2('bum): bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mig zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mig bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mig
399b3('bum): 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mig ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mig da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba rtag ces bya ba'am
399b4('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar
399b5('bum): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba bcings

399b7('bum): bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sna rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sna bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sna bdag

400a2('bum): ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sna bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sna 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sna ma 'ongs
400a3('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sna da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /lce rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /lce bde zhes

400a5('bum): bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /lce zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /lce bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /lce

405a6('bum): te reg pa rtag ces bya pa'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur

406a2('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa

406a5('bum): reg pa ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung

413b5('bum): 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rga shi da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos
413b6('bum): ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba'am
413b7('bum): bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi
414a1('bum): zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi

420b5('bum): pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos
420b6('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi
420b7('bum): 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos
421a1('bum): ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos
421a2('bum): ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par
421a3('bum): mi 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar
421a4('bum): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar
421a5('bum): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'das zhes bya bar chos ston
421a6('bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po
421a7('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes
421b1('bum): bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
421b2('bum): pa nyid sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos
421b3('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi
421b4('bum): 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par
421b5('bum): mi 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal
421b6('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
421b7('bum): sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye
422a1('bum): bar bzhag pa rnams bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams 'das zhes bya bar chos ston
422a2('bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi
422a3('bum): 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes
422a4('bum): bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug
422a5('bum): ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong
422a6('bum): ba rnams bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba
422a7('bum): rnams ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rtag
422b1('bum): ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi
422b2('bum): rkang pa rnams bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur
422b3('bum): ro| |rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston
422b4('bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rdzu
422b5('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnams
422b6('bum): bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnams bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnams
422b7('bum): sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnams zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnams bcings
423a1('bum): zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnams 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnams ma 'ongs
423a2('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnams da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /stobs rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par

423a6('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /stobs rnams da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya
423a7('bum): bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag
423b1('bum): ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan
423b2('bum): lag rnams zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang

423b4('bum): rnams da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags
423b5('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med
423b6('bum): ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag
423b7('bum): brgyad pa zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi
424a1('bum): 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma
424a2('bum): 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
424a3('bum): rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /
424a4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya
424a5('bum): bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bcings zhes

424a7('bum): 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bya ba'am
424b1('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan rnams bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan rnams bdag ces bya
424b2('bum): ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan rnams sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan rnams zhi
424b3('bum): zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan rnams bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan rnams

424b5('bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshad med pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshad med pa rnams bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston
424b6('bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshad med pa rnams bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshad med pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston
424b7('bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshad med pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshad med pa rnams bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par
425a1('bum): mi 'gyur ro/ /tshad med pa rnams 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshad med pa rnams ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /
425a2('bum): tshad med pa rnams da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur
425a3('bum): ro| |gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
425a4('bum): bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi
425a5('bum): 'gyur ro/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
425a6('bum): bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /
425a7('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams da ltar byung zhes bya bar par mi
425b1('bum): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal
425b2('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad sdug ces bya ba'am

425b4('bum): ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad ma 'ongs zhes bya bar
425b5('bum): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rtag ces bya ba'am
425b6('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mthar
425b7('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sdug ces bya
426a1('bum): ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos
426a2('bum): ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
426a3('bum): par 'jug pa dgu 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mthar gyis gnas
426a4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rtag ces bya
426a5('bum): ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
426a6('bum): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi
426a7('bum): 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar
426b1('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
426b2('bum): pa dang / smon pa med pa bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'das
426b3('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par
426b4('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya
426b5('bum): bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya ba'am bdag
426b6('bum): med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams zhi
426b7('bum): zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos sngon par mi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes
427a1('bum): pa rnams 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa
427a2('bum): rnams da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams bde zhes bya ba'am
427a3('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug ces bya ba'am
427a4('bum): mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams bcings zhes bya ba'am
427a5('bum): grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi
427a6('bum): 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /
427a7('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston
427b1('bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par
427b2('bum): mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs
427b3('bum): kyi sgo rnams ma 'ongs zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rtag ces
427b4('bum): bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs
427b5('bum): pa'i stobs bcu bdag ces bya ba'am bdag med ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par
427b6('bum): mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs ba'i stobs bcu zhi zhes bya ba'am ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bcings zhes bya ba'am grol
427b7('bum): zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'das zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma 'ongs zhes bya bar
428a1('bum): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams
428a2('bum): rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams bde zhes bya ba'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mi 'jigs pa

450b1('bum): pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /bsam gtan rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa
450b2('bum): med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni bsam gtan yongs su dag pa'o/ /tshad med pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam
450b3('bum): par byang ba med pa ni tshad med pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med
450b4('bum): pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas
450b5('bum): nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par thar pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa
450b6('bum): med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
450b7('bum): dang | mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
451a1('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun
451a2('bum): nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas
451a3('bum): nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs
451a4('bum): pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa
451a5('bum): dang | kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su dag pa'o/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag
451a6('bum): pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang /
451a7('bum): 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni so so yang dag par rig pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /byams pa chen po la skye ba med pa dang /
451b1('bum): 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni byams pa chen po yongs su dag pa'o/ /snying rje chen po la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa
451b2('bum): dang | kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni snying rje chen po yongs su dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa
451b3('bum): med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la skye ba
451b4('bum): med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su dag pa'o/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i
451b5('bum): 'bras bu la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su dag pa'o/ /phyir
451b6('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su dag pa'o/ /dgra
451b7('bum): bcom pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o/ /rang byang chub la skye ba
452a1('bum): med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rang byang chub yongs su dag pa'o/ /lam gyi rnam
452a2('bum): pa shes pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o/ /
452a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
452a4('bum): yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji
452a5('bum): ltar na nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa
452a6('bum): med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba med pa'i phyir/ shes
452a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na nam mkha' la 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
452b1('bum): dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ nam
452b2('bum): mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na nam mkha' la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes
452b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' sgra brnyan gnyis kyi sgra ltar nam mkha'
452b4('bum): la tha snyad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag
452b5('bum): pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na nam mkha' brjod du ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
452b6('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha' la ni gang yang brjod du med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /
452b7('bum): rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na nam mkha' dmigs
453a1('bum): su ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nam
453a2('bum): mkha' la gang yang dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du nam mkha' rang bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab
453a3('bum): 'byor/ gzhan yang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
453a4('bum): pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis
453a5('bum): pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ chos thams
453a6('bum): cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo
453a7('bum): gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de la mig gi nad 'byung
453b1('bum): bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lce'i nad dang / lus kyi nad dang / yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lus ngan par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgas 'khogs pa'i lus su
453b2('bum): mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni mi bde pa mi spong bas dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad bzhin lha brgya stong mang po 'brang bar 'gyur te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i
453b3('bum): ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa
453b4('bum): kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang /
453b5('bum): che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang slad
453b6('bum): bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang na chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga
453b7('bum): dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/
454a1('bum): rigs bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang ba tshad ma mchis pa/ grangs ma mchis pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa
454a2('bum): ma mchis pa/ gzhal du ma mchis pa dpag tu ma mchis pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/
454a3('bum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
454a4('bum): bu mo de ni bsod nams mang du 'phel te/ bsod nams kyi phung po mang ba/ tshad med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ dpag tu
454a5('bum): med pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che'o/ /rab 'byor/ de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
454a6('bum): rin po che ni/ 'di lta ste/ sems can dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o/ /byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi dang lha dbul po las yongs
454a7('bum): su grol bar byed pa'o/ /rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/ /bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/ /khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/ /
454b1('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /mtshe ma'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /dga'
454b2('bum): ldan gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /'phrul dga'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /tshangs ris kyi
454b3('bum): lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /tshangs chen gyi lha'i skye
454b4('bum): ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /snang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /chung snang gi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /
454b5('bum): kun snang dang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /dge ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /chung dge'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha'i skye
454b6('bum): ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /dge rgyas kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /che ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /chung che'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /tshad med
454b7('bum): che ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /mi che ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /mi gdung ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye
455a1('bum): mched 'byin pa'o/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /'og min gyi lha'i
455a2('bum): skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin
455a3('bum): pa'o| |cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /rgyun du zhugs
455a4('bum): pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid 'byin pa'o/ /rang byang chub
455a5('bum): 'byin pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par
455a6('bum): bstan te/ de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod
455a7('bum): do| |rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i
455b1('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod
455b2('bum): do| |tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /
455b3('bum): dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod
455b4('bum): do| |tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod
455b5('bum): do| |gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams
455b6('bum): yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
455b7('bum): bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol
456a1('bum): tu phyin pa 'di yod na/ bsam gtan bzhi yod do/ /tshad med pa bzhi yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yod do/ /dran pa nye
456a2('bum): bar bzhag pa bzhi yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yod do/ /dbang po lnga yod do/ /stobs lnga yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yod
456a3('bum): do| |'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /
456a4('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /
456a5('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong
456a6('bum): pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos
456a7('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /
456b1('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yod do/ /bsam gtan bzhi yod do/ /tshad med pa bzhi yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
456b2('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yod do/ /mngon
456b3('bum): par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yod do/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi yod
456b4('bum): do| |so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yod do/ /byams pa chen po yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do/ /thams cad shes pa
456b5('bum): nyid yod do/ /lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /de'ang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos de thams cad rgya
456b6('bum): cher bstan te/ de la bslabs na rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams
456b7('bum): yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i
457a1('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs
457a2('bum): pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /
457a3('bum): kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /
457a4('bum): che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung
457a5('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi
457a6('bum): lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched
457a7('bum): kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /
457b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /de
457b2('bum): bas na de la pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che zhes bya'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che de la ni/ chos gang yang skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang
457b3('bum): ba'am/ yongs su gzung ba'am/ dor ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'am/
457b4('bum): yongs su gzung ba'am/ dor bar bya ba'i chos de lta bu med do/ /rab 'byor/ pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ 'jigs rten pa'am/ 'jig
457b5('bum): rten las 'das pa'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa'am/ zag pa med pa'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med de/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs
457b6('bum): des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor/ pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che la ni chos gang gis kyang 'go ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang
457b7('bum): 'go bar 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor/ de'i phyir na pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'go ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gal te byang
458a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar 'du shes par yang mi byed la de ltar mi rtog
458a2('bum): cing de ltar mi dmigs te/ de ltar 'phro bar yang mi byed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o/ /de ni sangs rgyas
458a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par bsams shing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya
458a4('bum): ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bya
458a5('bum): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang
458a6('bum): yang ston pa'am/ rnam par ston pa'am/ yongs su ston pa'am/ 'dzin par byed pa'am/ 'byin par byed pa'am/ skye bar byed pa'am/ 'gog par byed pa'am/
458a7('bum): kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa'am/ rnam par byang bar byed pa'am/ 'grib par byed pa'am/ 'phel bar byed pa'am/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung bar
458b1('bum): byed pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams
458b2('bum): las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin// //shes rab
458b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgya go dgu pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma
458b4('bum): yin| 'dor ba ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha
458b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ phyi stong
458b6('bum): pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid
458b7('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa
459a1('bum): nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid

459a4('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/
459a5('bum): 'dor ba ma yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
459a6('bum): sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ dbang po rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ stobs rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgrub pa ma

459b1('bum): bsam gtan rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/

459b6('bum): yin| 'dor ba ma yin/ snying rje chen po sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
459b7('bum): bu sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ dgra
460a1('bum): bcom pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rang byang chub sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/
460a2('bum): 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor ba ma yin/
460a3('bum): 'dus ma byas kyi khams sgrub pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung / chos rnams
460a4('bum): kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa de ni de bzhin du gnas pa yin te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par sangs
460a5('bum): rgyas so/ /mngon par thugs su chud do/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud nas kyang gsung ngo / /ston to/ /rjod do/ 'grel
460a6('bum): to| |rnam par 'byed do/ /gsal bar mdzad do/ /yang dag par ston to/ /de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang po stong gi bar snang la 'khod nas lhung lhung ldegs kyi sgra phyung
460a7('bum): ste| lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mud dang / pun+da ri ka dang / man+da ra ba dang / man+da ra ba chen pos 'thor zhing 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to/ /kye ma
460b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pas/ lha'i bu stong phrag du ma skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te/ dzam+bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor bar mthong
460b2('bum): ngo| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor
460b3('bum): ba'ang ma yin/ gcig tu bskor ba'ang ma yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang chos gang yang 'khor ba'am/ mi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /gsol
460b4('bum): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar mi gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis
460b5('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /bsam gtan
460b6('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzod pa'i
460b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /nang stong pa nyid nang stong
461a1('bum): pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
461a2('bum): kyis stong ngo / /chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis
461a3('bum): stong ngo / /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /thog ma dang tha ma med
461a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong
461a5('bum): ngo| |chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi
461a6('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dngos po med pa'i
461a7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /yang dag par spong ba rnams yang dag
461b1('bum): par spong ba rnams kyis stong ngo / /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /dbang po rnams dbang po rnams kyis stong ngo / /stobs rnams stobs rnams kyis stong ngo / /
461b2('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ngo / /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ngo / /'phags pa'i bden pa
461b3('bum): rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ngo / /tshad med pa rnams tshad med pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
461b4('bum): par 'jug pa rnams gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /rnam par thar pa rnams rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
461b5('bum): 'jug pa rnams mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo
461b6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong ngo / /mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /ting nge 'dzin rnams ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis
461b7('bum): stong ngo / /gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ngo / /mi 'jigs pa rnams
462a1('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /byams pa chen po byams pa chen pos
462a2('bum): stong ngo / /snying rje chen po snying rje chen pos stong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun du zhugs
462a3('bum): pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo / /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo / /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo / /dgra bcom
462a4('bum): pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong ngo / /lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rnam pa thams cad
462a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po
462a6('bum): ste| 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o/ /de ni chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis stong la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
462a7('bum): k yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'ang chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par
462b1('bum): 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis/ chos kyi 'khor lo'ang skor la/ chos gang yang 'khor ba'am/ mi 'khor ba'am/ rab tu 'khor bar bgyid pa ma mchis te/ de dag gis chos gang yang yongs su
462b2('bum): mthong ba'am/ yongs su ma mthong ba ma mchis pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'am/ rab tu 'khor bar bgyi ba'i chos de
462b3('bum): lta bu dmigs su ma mchis te/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad kyang shin tu mngon par ma grub pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ stong pa nyid ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyid
462b4('bum): pa ma lags so/ /mtshan ma ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so/ /smon pa ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyid pa
462b5('bum): ma lags so/ /de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / bsgrags pa dang / rab tu 'god pa dang / gzhag pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / rnam par dgrol
462b6('bum): ba dang / smos pa dang / gsal bar bgyi ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa de'ang
462b7('bum): sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung ngo / /gang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung ba de ni/ sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis so/ /gang sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis pa de la ni/ yongs su mya
463a1('bum): ngan las 'das pa ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di la gang su'ang sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba ma mchis so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya
463a2('bum): pa las/ le'u nyi shu brgyad pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
463a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/

463a6('bum): kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thub pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams
463a7('bum): cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
463b1('bum): bka' stsal pa/ ming dang lus med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
463b2('bum): bka' stsal pa/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
463b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
463b4('bum): pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /
