463b6('bum): 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
463b7('bum): chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skad gcig ma ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom
464a1('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad byang zhing zad pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
464a2('bum): ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba dang / 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta
464a3('bum): ste| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byed pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/
464a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa po dmigs su
464a5('bum): med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
464a6('bum): stsal pa/ 'chi ba dang skye ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
464a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmi lam
464b1('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rmi lam mthong ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
464b2('bum): 'di ni sgra brnyan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan pa dang sgrar brjod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes
464b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mig yor gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ me long gi bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
464b4('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smig rgyu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
464b5('bum): 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom
464b6('bum): ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dmigs su med
464b7('bum): pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
465a1('bum): bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam
465a2('bum): par byang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
465a3('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ni dmigs su ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
465a4('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir
465a5('bum): ro| |gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rlom
465a6('bum): sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi g.yo ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom
465a7('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags dang
465b1('bum): bral ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma nor ba yang dag pa nyid du mngon par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
465b2('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas ldang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa'i
465b3('bum): pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams
465b4('bum): cad mtshan ma med cing dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu
465b5('bum): phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhe sdang ma
465b6('bum): mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
465b7('bum): 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad sel ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/
466a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yongs su rtog pa med
466a2('bum): pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
466a3('bum): stsal pa/ sems can med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rab tu spangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan
466a4('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha'
466a5('bum): gnyis su mi 'gyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' rnam par spong ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes
466a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tha mi dad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'dres pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom
466a7('bum): ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyams pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs
466b1('bum): rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom
466b2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma

466b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la chags pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
466b5('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi rtag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/
466b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad tshor bar sbyor ba med
466b7('bum): pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

467a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
467a3('bum): phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom
467a4('bum): ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i
467a5('bum): phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi'i chos
467a6('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
467a7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi
467b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
467b2('bum): phyin pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
467b3('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i
467b4('bum): phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
467b5('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin
467b6('bum): pa'o| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
467b7('bum): 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/
468a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
468a2('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dor
468a3('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
468a4('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos dmigs
468a5('bum): su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
468a6('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
468a7('bum): nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid dben pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
468b1('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
468b2('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i chos nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol
468b3('bum): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos rnams ngo bo nyid
468b4('bum): kyis dben pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan
468b5('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar
468b6('bum): bzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus dang tshor ba dang sems dang chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/
468b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /
469a1('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
469a2('bum): pa| rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dbang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom
469a3('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbang po lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin

469a6('bum): lta ste| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med pa'i
469a7('bum): phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa
469b1('bum): nyid kyi rnam pa dang / rnam par dben pa'i rnam pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i pha

469b6('bum): pa dgu dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
469b7('bum): pa| sbyin pa dang ser sna dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan

470a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnod sems dang bzod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
470a3('bum): 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ le lo dang brtson 'grus dmigs su med
470a4('bum): pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsam
470a5('bum): gtan dang 'khrug pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom
470a6('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes rab dang 'chal ba'i shes rab dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
470a7('bum): 'di ni stobs bcu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad thub pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/
470b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes zhum pa med pa'i phyir
470b2('bum): ro| |gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam pa
470b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa med pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byams pa chen po'i pha rol
470b4('bum): tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snying rje
470b5('bum): chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab
470b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
470b7('bum): las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan
471a1('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brjod pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
471a2('bum): rang byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab
471a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
471a4('bum): ba'i phyir ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u nyid shu dgu pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha
471a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rna lam du grag pa de dag ni/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sems
471a6('bum): can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag
471a7('bum): ni| dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung pa'o/ /gang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing gzung ba dang / 'chang
471b1('bum): ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par byas nas kyang de bzhin nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa lta ci smos te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi
471b2('bum): p ha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag gis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yongs
471b3('bum): su dris so/ /yongs su zhus so/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur zhing thos nas 'dzin cing
471b4('bum): 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag ni bskal pa bye ba mang por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
471b5('bum): pa la spyad do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad
471b6('bum): do snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
471b7('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa
472a1('bum): de dag ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang 'dra bar gzung bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes
472a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa ste/ sngon sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
472a3('bum): phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma spyad pas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos kyang mos par bgyi bar mi
472a4('bum): nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas spang bar sems pa dag gis ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab
472a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs par gyur to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa'i
472a6('bum): tshe| dad pa dang mos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'
472a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos rnams la bsnyen bkur ma bgyis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni
472b1('bum): ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar
472b2('bum): spyad par bgyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ phyi stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom
472b3('bum): par bgyi/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ chen po stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni ji ltar
472b4('bum): bsgom par bgyi/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom
472b5('bum): par bgyi/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ rang gi mtshan
472b6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ji ltar
472b7('bum): bsgom par bgyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni ji ltar bsgom
473a1('bum): par bgyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dbang po rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ stobs rnams ni ji ltar
473a2('bum): bsgom par bgyi/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i bden
473a3('bum): pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ bsam gtan rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ tshad med pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
473a4('bum): ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ rnam par thar pa'i
473a5('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ji ltar bsgom
473a6('bum): par bgyi/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ mi 'jigs pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/
473a7('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ byams pa chen po ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ snying rje chen po ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
473b1('bum): pa bco brgyad ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi zhes yongs su ma zhus/ yongs su ma dris so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun
473b2('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shin tu zab na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ sngon ma spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
473b3('bum): chen po mos par mi 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar yang ci che/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
473b4('bum): tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
473b5('bum): dang | chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa
473b6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos
473b7('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
474a1('bum): rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden
474a2('bum): pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
474a3('bum): par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi
474a4('bum): sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas
474a5('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mos par mi 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar yang
474a6('bum): ci che| btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la
474a7('bum): phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no/ /kau shi ka/ de de bzhin te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag
474b1('bum): 'tshal ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
474b2('bum): do| |rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes las kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod do/ /kau shi ka/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/
474b3('bum): rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha
474b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
474b5('bum): brtson par bya'o/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
474b6('bum): bu la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /sems can rnams lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa'i
474b7('bum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /sems can rnams phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
475a1('bum): bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /sems can rnams dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos
475a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /sems can rnams rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
475a3('bum): brtson par bya'o/ /sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
475a4('bum): brtson par bya'o/ /sems can rnams 'tshang rgya ba nyid la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /khams
475a5('bum): gsum gyi phul du 'gyur bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /bdud pham par bya bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am
475a6('bum): rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
475a7('bum): la brtson par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems
475b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
475b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
475b3('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi
475b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na
475b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan
475b6('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar
475b7('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi stong pa nyid la brtson par
476a1('bum): bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol
476a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chen po stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa
476a3('bum): lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
476a4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar
476a5('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thog ma
476a6('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/
476a7('bum): ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos
476b1('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes
476b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la brtson
476b3('bum): par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
476b4('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/
476b5('bum): ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
476b6('bum): rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dbang po rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
476b7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ stobs rnams la brtson par bgyid pa legs/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar
477a1('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha
477a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan rnams
477a3('bum): la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad med pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
477a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par
477a5('bum): thar pa brgyad la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la brtson par
477a6('bum): bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la brtson par bgyid pa
477a7('bum): lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
477b1('bum): tshe| ting nge 'dzin rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi
477b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la
477b3('bum): brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol
477b4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ snying rje chen po la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ ji
477b5('bum): ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de
477b6('bum): ltar khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so/ /kau shi ka/ khyod kyi spobs pa
477b7('bum): 'di'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byung ngo / / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyis brgya tham pa/ /kau shi ka/ 'di la byang chub sems
478a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe gzugs la brtson
478a2('bum): par byed do/ /tshor ba la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe tshor ba la mi gnas pa de'i tshe tshor ba la brtson par byed do/ /'du shes la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe 'du shes la mi gnas pa de'i tshe 'du
478a3('bum): shes la brtson par byed do/ /'du byed la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe 'du byed la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ 'du byed la brtson par byed do/ /rnam par shes pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam
478a4('bum): par shes pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed do/ /mig la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe mig la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ mig la brtson par byed do/ /rna ba la mi
478a5('bum): gnas te/ gang gi tshe rna ba la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rna ba la brtson par byed do/ /sna la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe sna la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sna la brtson par byed do/ /lce la mi gnas te/
478a6('bum): gang gi tshe lce la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ lce la brtson par byed do/ /lus la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe lus la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ lus la brtson par byed do/ /yid la mi gnas te/ gang

478b1('bum): te| gang gi tshe sgra la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ sgra la brtson par byed do/ /dri la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe dri la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ dri la brtson par byed do/ /ro la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe ro la mi
478b2('bum): gnas pa de'i tshe/ ro la brtson par byed do/ /reg la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe reg la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ reg la brtson par byed do/ /chos la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe chos la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/
478b3('bum): chos la brtson par byed do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed do/ /rna ba'i rnam

479a1('bum): gnas te/ gang gi tshe mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la brtson par byed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas te/ gang
